304b2: a D+hA k+She/ ak+Sha ya lo be/ ad+h+yA ma/ ni mi re shrI ta bi sta re/ ang gu dza/ d+hA nga nye/ dza dza ra no se a na sa shud+d+he/ mri ga g+hi k+She/ ku la baTe/ ma ga bA bA/ k+She b+hau ba swa re/ a b+hi ti mu b+hu re/ swa ra kha dze smi ti mo ni swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
304b3: kyis byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros mi zad pa la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po 'di bshad pas sems can dpag du med
304b4: pa rnams kyis thos pa'i mig kun tu ston par byed la/ / nga'i bstan pa yang ston par byed pa ni legs so// legs so// de nas de nyid du thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi
304b5: zad pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad du skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rdzogs par bshad pas da ltar dang / 'ongs pa'i dus su theg pa chen po la yang dag
304b6: par zhugs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi mos pa mang po'i tshogs rgyas par byed pa dang / ston pa ni skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das
304b7: gal bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gling bzhi pa 'di'i me tog dang / 'bras bu dang shing dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / lo tog dag bsrung bar 'tshal/
304b8: sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dang / rtswa dang / mad pa ma dang / khoms larten pa rnams bsrung bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das dang gu dpal gyi rdul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po dang ltang 'di glang bar

305a1: pa de dag gis sngon ma thos ma mthong bas 'di ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byur bar gyur te/ 'dus pa chen po de lta bu dga'athung ba'i bgyis lags so// nang gu dpal gyi rdul zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di ni mthu che bas le tog
305a2: thams cad 'phel bar bgyid pa lags so/ / sa bon dang / myu gu dang / sdong bu dang / mdab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / shing dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro rnams bskyed par bgyid pa dang / 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / snum mchis
305a3: par bgyid pa dang / 'jam par bgyid pa dang / mang por bgyid pa lags so// sems can thams cad dad par bgyid pa dang / tshul khrims can du bgyid pa dang / thos par bgyid pa dang / shes par bgyid pa dang / byams pa dang / snying
305a4: rje can du bgyid pa dang / thabs dang ldan par bgyid pa nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du ston par bgyid pa lags so// tad ya thA/ a na N+ya b+ha mi/ ga ba kA bi dze/ gu lo tsa lo me/ pha tak+Sha lo me/ shrI yak+Sha ku su men
305a5: ba ku mud me Te/ rA dza ba ra me/ tsa Ta na ba ba ma Te/ bi shu la dge/ a ba b+ha su ne ha sa ga b+hAk+She/ lo ma b+hu dze k+She/ gam b+hi ra ba su ma/ a no ma ya/ sa re ba la sha to ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nang gu dpal gyi rdul zhes bkyi
305a6: ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te sgreng bar bgyid dam/ skad chen por sgrog gam// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di tshu la lan stong gi bar du bzlas brjod pagyis nas zhing dang / shing dang / lo thog sna tshags la ga
305a7: ta marda dang / rdza nga dang / dung dag la sngags de dag gi sgra gang du thos pa'i lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman gyi ro dang / sa la rten pa'i lo thog thams cad sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu
305a8: lus pa ma gtogs par lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / yi dgas mthu bo che dang / bdud dang bdud kyi bu dang / bdud kyi 'khor gyi tshogs gang gis kyang gnod par bgyi ba 'am// chu ga zan pa 'am/ tshig par bgyi ba 'am/ bskam

305b1: ba 'am/ mdangs 'phrog pa 'am// mthu chung bar bgyi ba 'am/ ma mchis par bgyi ba dag tu rngo mi thog na sems can dang sems can gyi grang su gtogs pa gzhan dag gis lha spos kyang ci 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das
305b2: kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de la legs so zhes bya bar gnang ste/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kring bzhi pa 'dir sbyin pa chen po'i dpal gyi shing rta la zhon nas/ rigs kyi bu 'dir than med pa'i byang chub kyi la ma du sems can
305b3: dpag tu med pa rnams rton par byed pa ni rigs kyi bu khyod legs so legs so/ / de nas de nyid du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyung pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te// rigs kyi bu
305b4: khyod kyis de ltar byas pa ni legs so legs so/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// byams pa khyod la bdag gis
305b5: dpal me tog sar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po sbyin gyis/ / gzungs chen po de nas rigs kyi bu khod kyis byams pa chen po'i go bgos nas/ 'dir sems can rnams la tshig gis chos ston na ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par
305b6: 'phrul pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i chos de dag sems can gang dag gis thos pa'i sdig pa'i sems dang / sdig pa'i lta ba dag spong bar byed do// sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i gshes gnyen dag spong bar byed do// sems
305b7: kyis byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yid la byed par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la snying rtse ba dang / sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba can tu 'gyur ro// sems mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag las ldog
305b8: par 'gyur ro/ / sems dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la rnam par gnas par 'gyur ro// sems sems can thams cad la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// gzungs chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs

306a1: su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos kyi char 'bebs par byed pa'o/ / dgra thams cad rab tu dad par byed cing bshes gnyen thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o// tad ya thA/ li pa ta swa re kA shA ya bar me sa me
306a2: bag g+he/ d+ha rang ga dza le/ swa tok+Sha swa tok+Sha/ swa ma hA b+hak+Sha re/ su ha phung ge/ gau a ba lo ka da le/ sid d+hi pi pa k+ShaM/ D+ha nan pi pa re/ a bin d+ha lud be/ sa tsa ra tsa la/ a ba b+ha sa re/ ba ra ha shang traM/ e ka had ta ye/ sa ma d+hi kar
306a3: pal dza pi ti/ ma hA d+ha b+hU ta ku se/ a ra Na nI le/ ma le ma she me/ nI la ku su me swA hA// dpal me tog sa ra ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi byams pa chen po'i go bgos nas/
306a4: sems can rnams la chos ston na/ de'i sgra tha na sems can srog chags su gyur pa phra mo chu ru gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa/ de dag gi sems kyi rnyog pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang / de dag gi sems dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnas par
306a5: yang 'gyur na mir gyur pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sems can la la dag gis char dbab pa'i phyir dri za dang / klu'i gnas dag du gzungs chen po 'di bzlas brjod byas te/ na le sham gyi phye ma dang / e ran da'i ma
306a6: du bsre sa ba la des lan stong du bsngags nas/ gos kyi mtha' mar phur ma byas te khro na par btsug na/ des nad la klu rnams dga' bar 'gyur te/ char gyi rgyan chen po yang 'bebs par byed do// de'i tshe yul der 'dus
306a7: ba'i klu dang / klu chen po rnams kyis dpal me tog sar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di thos nas sems rangs pa dang / snang sems med pa dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems byams pa dang ldan pa dang / sems 'dzis/
306a8: rten pa ros lag bar gnas par gyur to// sems dkon mchog gsum la dang cing bkur sti dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri ma byed pa dag thob par gyur to// sems dud 'gror skye ba'i rang gi sdig pa'i las dag rab du chags pa /

306b1: sems theg pa chen po bla na med pa la 'jug par gnas par gyur to// klu dang / klu chen po de dag thams cad kyi nang nas mthu ci yod pa dang / ce nas bdag gis de na bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ba'i phyir kha cig ni gser mang
306b2: po'i char mngon par 'bebs so/ / kha cig ni dngul dang / a ka ru dang / rgya spos dang / gor shi sha dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i chang dag mngon par 'bebs pa nas kha cig ni ud pa la dang / me tog sna
306b3: tshogs dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs dang / gser sked dang / mu dag gi do shal gyi bar dag gi char mngon par 'bebs so// de nas klu dang / klu chen po de dag thams cad kyis/
306b4: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar bdag cag ni dkon mchog gsum la sems shin tu legs par rab tu zhugs
306b5: palags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag 'di rnams kyis dam bca' bar bgyi ba ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ldengs gang dang / gang dag na dpal me tog sa rab
306b6: zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rab tu sgrogs pa dang / de bzhin tu gzungs lhag mchu khyim snying po zhes bgyi ba dang / mtshon cha'i stobs shes bgyi ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba dang /
306b7: nad gu dpal rdul zhes bgye ba dang / dpal me tog sar ba zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis bshad pa'i gzungs de dag dang / klu'i snying po bzhi po dag grong dang / grong khyer dang // gror rdal dang /
306b8: ljongs dang / ri brags kyi gnas gang dang gang dag ru re ra tsam yang ston tam/ 'chang ngam/ rab tu sgrogs sam/ dran par bgyid pa de dang de dag tu bdag cag gis dus dus su char 'bebs pa dang / gdugs dang / gser

307a1: mdag gtong bar bgyi'o/ / dus ma lags par ni ma lags so// de dang der bdag cag gis phyi dgra dang / nang 'khrug dang / thab mo dang / rmod pa dang / gnod sems dang / nad dang / ming sa dang / muge dag rab du zhing
307a2: bkyi lags so/ / de dang der bdag cag gis skyid pa dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' bar gyur pa dag pa sgrub pa rab kyi lags so// de dang deng sems can rnams kyis bon dang / mU gu dang / sdong bu dang / mdab ma dang / me tog dang /
307a3: 'bras bu dang / shid dang / spyan dang / ro dag mi nyams par 'phel bar bgyi lags so// longs spyod dang / yongs su spyong pa phal cher dri zhim pa dang / ro zhim pa dang / snum pa dang / 'jam pa dag du bsgrub par bgyi lags so//
307a4: bdag cag gis 'dzam du gling 'di'i rgyal po rnams kyang gzhi ga ci byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / khon ma mchis pa'i sems dang / cod pa ma mchis pa'i sems su bsgrub pa rab kyi lags so// de bzhin
307a5: du bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs dang / gnod sbyin rnams nas dge bsnyen dag gi bar dag du byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bsgrub par bgyi lags so// gang na gzungs chen po 'di rab tu sgrags pa dar/
307a6: nang phan tshun sems 'thun par bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad la legs so legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // thams ca dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lpags pa rnams kyis kyang legs so/
307a7: zhes bya ba byin no nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i snying pos kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal lham chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pal chog shes khyod la snying rtse ba'i thogs 'a
307a8: dag yod na 'dir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir da dung du ci'i phyir gdul ba'i tshogs rnams bzhugs par mi nus/ dpal lha mo chen mos gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni smon lam

307b1: gyi khyad par gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa thams cad du de lta bur skye ba len cing / grogs dge ba'i rashes snyen 'thun pa de lta bu dag dang phrad pa thob lags so// da ltar bdag kyang grogs dge ba'i bshes
307b2: gnyen 'thun pa khyod lta bu dang phrad pa lags so/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang de'i lag tu thob ste/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang rjod par bgyi lags so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
307b3: po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu gnas par blta bar bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpal cho ga shes
307b4: khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de ltar yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa thams cad du//
307b5: de lta bur skye ba len la/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag la brtson zhing der brtson pa brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen de lta bus yongs su zin pa yin no// rnam pa thams
307b6: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de'i lag tu thob pa yin te/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par yang brjod par bya'o// des rnam par gnon pa yang brjod par bya'o// mngal gyi skyon las thar par yang
307b7: brjod par bya'o/ / mi slob pa'i sa la gnas pas zag pa zad par yang brjod par bya'o// de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis dgongs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs par yang brjod par bya'o// 'dod
307b8: chags dang bral ba'i sa la shin tu gnas par brjod par bya'o/ / de nas brgya byin gzi brjid rtsim med pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal bde logs su thal ma byur ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun

308a1: pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir klu dang / klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod pa bgyid lags/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i
308a2: dbang po rgyu dang rkyen gnyis kyis 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir klu dang / klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod par byed do// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod chags kyi dbang
308a3: dang / khro ba'i dbang gis dus ma yin pa'i sprin dag 'byung bar byed cing / rdzi char dang / ser drag dag 'bebs par byed do// lhags pa dang / tsha ba dag 'byung bar byed do// des na 'dir sems can rnams kyi sa bon dang /
308a4: myu gu dang / mdab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dag tshig par byed do// skems par byed do// 'brul bar byed do// ma rungs par byed do// de nas sems can rnams longs spyod dang /
308a5: yongs su spyod pa dang mi ldan pas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sdig pa'i las mi bzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag kun tu spyod par byed do// las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa des na sngon dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa thams cad
308a6: kyang sreg par byed do/ / skems par byed do// thal bar rlog par byed do// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag spong zhing ngan song gsum po dag la gzhol bar byed do// kha cig gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba tsam gyi
308a7: phyir tshe gcig gis de lta bur sdig pa'i las mtshams med pa dag gi bar du kun tu spyod par byed do/ / de bskal pa mang po zhig gi bar du phyis mir skye ba 'thob par mi 'gyur ro// gal te de bdag yun ring
308a8: po 'das nas brgyal brgya lam na mi'i lus thob nas yang kha cig ni yan lag nyams par 'gyur ro/ / kha cig ni dran pa nyams par 'gyur ro// gdol pa'i rigs su yang skye bar 'gyur ro// g.yung po'i

308b1: rigs dang / smug ma mkhan gyi rigs dang / bkren pa dbul ba'i rigs rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro// bza' ba dang / btung ba'i longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag dang yang bral bar 'gyur la/ yang
308b2: rgyu des na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bas lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las kyi sgrib pa mi bzod pa dag kun tu spyod par byed do// yang kha cig ngan song gsum po dang / mnar med pa dag tu yang gzhol bar 'gyur ro//
308b3: rigs kyi bu de ltar longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'khor bar yun ring du nyam thag par 'gyur ro// ngan song gsum po dag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa sna tshogs dag nyams
308b4: su myong bar 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ sdug bsngal gang chung zad ci byung ba thams cad ni zas kyi rkyen las gyur pa lags te/ zas ma mchis na sdug bsngal 'byung ba yang ma mchis lags so// de nas de'i tshe brgya byin
308b5: gzi brjid dri ma med pas tshigs su bcad de 'di skad ces gsol to/ / sred pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na// ngu bdag ni rgod par bgyid// nye bar gnas shing ltung bar bgyid// kun tu spyod cing rnam par rgyug/ sa
308b6: gzhi dgal til brdungs ltar/ / sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gnod par bgyid// lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad la// da ltar sred pas gnod par bgyid// kye ma sred pa'i zhags pa yis// srid pa'i rtsa
308b7: mo'i mthar gtugs pas/ / de ltar zhags 'di rgya che ba// kha zas dag gi rgyu las byung // so so'i skye bo rgyu gnyis kyi// sred pa'i rdul gyis yan lag bcings// ri dgas zhags pas bcings pa ltar// 'bros pa
308b8: dag du nus ma lags/ / lhar bcas 'jig rten sems can dag/ sred pas gar bgyid rtsol ba ltar// gar gzhung dag la gar mkhan rgyas// de ni gar bgyid rtsol mi nus// srid pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na//

309a1: ji ltar skye bo myos pa ltar// btung ba myos bgyid bslad pa yis// myos pa dag du mi bgyid do// sred pa'i gnod sbyin gdon dag gis// skye bo brlams nas 'khyal pa ltar// 'byung po'i gdon gyis myos
309a2: pa dag/ 'khyal ba dag tu mi bgyid do// nor 'dzin de dag 'dzin pa btang // srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par spangs// gang gis sred pa bskams nas kyang // de dag 'khor bar mi gnas so// byang chub sems dpa'
309a3: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / zhe sdang khro bas skye dgu brlams// sems kyang g.yeng 'gyur de yis na// dge ba thams cad mi 'tshal zhing // bzod rlag las la spyod par bgyid// mi
309a4: dge ba la gnas bgyid pa/ / pha ma ngag la rim gro chung // gang dag mtshams ma mchis bgyid pa// dkon mchog gsum la brnyas par bgyid// snying rtse snying rje ma mchis pa// 'jigs bgyid gtum po drag shul can// khro
309a5: sems dbang gis de dag ni/ / sems dmyal mnar ma mchis par gnas// sems can 'di dag khro ba'i rgyus// gcig la gcig ni za bar bgyid// yang dang yang ni ngan song du// sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir//
309a6: sdig pa'i sems kyis brid gyur cing // dge ba'i bshes gnyen spangs nas kyang // srid pa'i mtshor ni ltung ba ste// mun pa mun nag gzhol ba po// de 'dra'i sems can don slad du// byang chub sems dpa' snying rtse ba'i//
309a7: bsam pas bdag bde btang nas kyang // sems can sdig pa bsal slad du// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na// bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos sum gyis// sdig pa'i sems can grol bgyid cing // chos kyi rgyal mtshan slong bar bgyid//
309a8: sems can 'ga'i don slad du// lus dang srog dag btang nas kyang // dka' thub brtul zhugs spyad ldan pa// dka' ba dag ni mang du spyad// gang tshe sems can 'ga' slad du// bskal brgyar sdug bsngal sel bgyid na// sems can rnams

309b1: slad yun ring du/ / 'khor bar sdug bsngal bzod par bgyi// sems can yongs su smin slad nas// de 'dra'i bsam dang ldan pa yis// sem can sred pa'i bsam pa can// sems ni byang chub mngon bgyi stsal// de nam dpal lha mo chen
309b2: mos/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bre bo le tog gis bkang ba de phul nas smras pa// gling bzhi pa 'di'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag gi rgyur
309b3: mthon dang / la tog thams cad 'phel bar bgyi pa dang / grub par bgyi pa'i slad du skyes bu dam pa khyod la lhung bzed 'bul lo// des na dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'chad pa/ ma rungs pa/ gtum po/ drag gral can kun tu
309b4: sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral pa dang / / byang chub kyi sa bon la gzhag par rngo thog go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bre bo lo tog gis bkang ba de blangs
309b5: nas phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dgongs su gsol// gang gis gling bzhi pa 'dir sa bon dang /
309b6: myu gu dang / mdab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dang / sa'i bcud dang / gzi byin dang / sems can gyi gzi byin dang / dam pa'i chos kyi ro dang / snying ku dang / gzi byin dag mi nyams shing 'phel bar bgyid
309b7: pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi bcad par bgyid pa dang / gang gi de longs spyod pa dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang // sdig pa las zlog
309b8: bar bgyid pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la dgod par rngo thog pa dang / gang gis 'dir sems can de dag thams cad kyis ngan song rnams yongs su spangs nas mtho rime la gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis dpal lha mo chen mo de'i bsam

310a1: pa yongs rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar phyogs btsun gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa bzhugs shing 'tshal gzhes pa thams cad 'dir dgongs su gsol/ / tad ya thA/ mu ni shig sa ni na tre/
310a2: mu ni pa la/ mu ni sa li/ san ta/ u sa k+Shi ti/ k+Sha nu pra Na nI la ba ya ba sarba bi dza ba sti la le swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang nas dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal cho ga shre/
310a3: khyod kyis gling bzhi pa 'dir sa bon dang / myu gu dang / lo tog 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems can yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir khyod ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa ma lus pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab so//
310a4: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin kau shi kas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci ltar gzung bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
310a5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya'o/ / ri'i snying pos zhus pa zhes bya'o// gzungs kyi za ma tog ces bya'o// sa'i bcud 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor sems can yongs su smin par byed pa
310a6: zhes bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dpal lha mo chen mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
310a7: yid rangs te mngon par bstod do/ / 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba d+hA de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba btsa
310a8: dpal brtsegs kyis bskur cing klas nas gtan la phab pa/ / ye d+harmA he tra pra b+ha bA he tren+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te Sha lo na ro d+ha e ban+d+ha dI ma hA tha ma NiH//
